mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARENT(par_id, par_name, par_password, par_auth_level, par_stu_id, par_phone, par_address, par_sex) VALUES(#{parId}, #{parName}, #{parPassword}, #{parAuthLevel}, #{parStuId}, #{parPhone}, , #{parAddress}, #{parSex})
mapper.select: SELECT par_id, par_name, par_password, par_auth_level, par_stu_id, par_phone, par_address, par_sex FROM PARENT WHERE par_id = #{value}
